clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Mild inflammatory uptake in thyroid region.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in thyroid with SUVmax 6.47.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
